verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Deep down into
The depths of this, Thy Name,
My God, I sink and
Dwell in calm delight
Thou art enough
However long the day
Thou art enough
However dark the night

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thou art my God,
The All-Sufficient One
Thou canst create
For me whate'er I lack;
Thy mighty hand has
Strewn the lonely track
With miracles of
Love and tender care

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
For me, Thy trusting one,
My God I dare
Once more to fling
Myself upon Thy breast
And there adore Thy ways
In faith's deep rest
And there adore Thy ways
In faith's quiet rest
